title: Is it a horror or thriller or neither?
review: Waiting, waiting, waiting for it to get scary, weird, thrilling. No, no, no. Interesting and not that predictable but not as good as expected. Disappointed.

title: Yawn
review: Could not distinguish between horror and comedy to start, which can be ok!?. Then no, just no, poor poor poor. Worked the end out from the start, give it a miss x from a horror and thriller film lover.

title: Just gets worse the more you watch.
review: Long, very long, wierd, not even funny weird, thought it was building up to be good but no, time I will never get back. Disappointing and should not be in the horror category.
